TopicTitle: I wish Parts Windows layouts were savable.

Articles.Content:
Hi!

Been playing KSP for many years now, but this is the first time I've ever posted to the forum!

For a while, I've been overly obsessed with getting all the parts windows pinned on the in-flight screen; having all that info available at a glance is incredibly convenient! But if I switch to another vehicle or return to the Space Center, all those carefully positioned windows disappear, and I have to pin them again.  I wish there were some way to save the layout of these windows so I wouldn't have to do it all over every time...

Still a fantastic game!

Thanks!
